title: Stock Market Volatility Takes Back Seat to Commodity, FX Swings
description: Equities have been far less volatile than almost everything else so far this year, with bigger swings racing through the markets for precious metals, currencies and commodities.
content: Equities have been far less volatile than almost everything else so far this year, with bigger swings racing through the markets for precious metals, currencies and commodities.
